narrative.iWantTo: use the system without any errors

scenario.title: lecturer adds a session to a course
scenario.step: And a booking system containing a course 30
When course 30 and session 200 are provided
Then session 200 is added to course 30

scenario.title: lecturer adds a session to a course
scenario.step: When course 30 and session 210 are provided
